bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zhi 痔瘡 , piles, with tumorous flesh-growths to the side of the anus that are exposed outside the anus and frequently release pus and blood. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 34: 牡痔候：肛邊生鼠乳，出在外者，時時出膿血者是也 , “The signs of male piles : Mouse teats develop to the side of the anus. When they appear outside [of the anus] they often release pus and blood”.
